data.message: Please I Want to Know How Can I Solve This Problem When I Write My Account And Password Face Book Tell Me : In order to access your account, please check for an SMS at +201114449820. Simply click the link in that SMS to confirm your new phone number. And SMS Didn,t Sent When I Choose Resend Tell Me : Something went wrong, please try again later. And This Problem Still Face Me From 25 - 30 Hour Please Solve This Problem As Fast As Possible
